text: Turpan, also referred to Turfan or Tulufan in Chinese, is an oasis county- level city in Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region of China. ==Background== Historically, Turpan is an important ancient stop on the Silk Road in China. Turpan means 'the lowest place' in Uygur and 'the fertile land' in Turki. Now the city is a tourist spot with unique landscape, abundant historical relics and fertile farmland. ==Other websites== *Photos of Turpan Attractions Category:Geography of Xinjiang Category:Cities in China
title: Turpan
